ThingDef.label: heavy animal armor (tiny)
ThingDef.description: Heavy-duty animal armor. Cumbersome, but offers a significant amount of protection due to thick plasteel plating and a high-quality synthread lining.\n\nFits on animals with a mature body size of less than 0.3.
